item.title: Convert Jupyter Notebook with CJK to PDF on Macos
item.description: Install Dependencies Follow nbconvert Installation Guide to install dependencies. 1 2 3 pip install nbconvert pip install pandoc brew install mactex Install CJK Font Use system font or install any CJK font. I prefer Sarasa Gothic (更纱黑体 / 更紗黑體 / 更紗ゴシック / 사라사고딕). 1 brew install font-sarasa-gothic Convert the Notebook to PDF Convert the notebook to tex 1 jupyter nbconvert --to latex notebook-to-convert.
